title: X Christmas 2008 [320kbps]
description:
X Christmas is a holiday compilation album, featuring Tooth & Nail/BEC Records artists performing their own renditions of Christmas carols, as well as original songs about Christmas.

It was released Tuesday, October 28, 2008.

X Christmas is part of the X the album series.

Track Listing

   1. "Jingle Bell Rock" - Thousand Foot Krutch
   2. "Gloria" - Hawk Nelson
   3. "Little Drummer Boy" - The Almost
   4. "Evergreen" - Switchfoot
   5. "Feliz Navidad" - David Crowder Band
   6. "Christmas, Baby Please Come Home" - Anberlin
   7. "Mary Did You Know?" - Kutless
   8. "Christmas Shoes" - FM Static
   9. "Love Came Down At Christmas" - Jars Of Clay
  10. "This Time Of Year" - Project 86
  11. "Do You Hear What I Hear?" - Seventh Day Slumber
  12. "Silent Night" - Sanctus Real
  13. "Carol Of The Bells" (Instrumental) - August Burns Red
  14. "It&#039;s Christmas Time" - KJ-52
  15. "His Favorite Christmas Story" - Capital Lights
  16. "Rockin&#039; Around The Christmas Tree" - Jaymes Reunion
  17. "Angels We Have Heard On High" - Corey Crowder
